QuestData.Title: Twisted Intentions
QuestData.Description:
Sails... in the fog...
A light below... in the darkness.
Water rising... given form... the pain...
AHHHH, THE PAIN!
Make it stop. Make it stop. Make the pain stop!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Bound Tempest and Enthralled Tidefury.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Taelia at the Wavespeaker's Sanctum in Sagehold.
QuestData.RewardText: Their rituals are growing bolder. Sooner or later they're going to summon something they can't control.
